oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Medicine show, Huntingdon, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shahn, Ben, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Leisure
Blackface entertainers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of African American performer in blackface.

This photograph shows an African American performer in blackface at a medicine show in Huntingdon, Tennessee in 1935. Medicine shows carried performers to help gather crowds to hear pitches for patent medicines.
